Dictionary

Norsk

English

Animals

  • Dyr = Animal(s)
  • Apekatt = Monkey
  • Hund = Dog
  • Hai = Shark
  • Ku = Cow
  • Ekorn = Squirrel
  • Elg = Moose
  • Reinsdyr = Reindeer
  • Bjørn = Bear

Housing

  • Bolig = Housing
  • Dør = Door
  • Vegg = Dør
  • Vindu = Window
  • Tak = Ceiling/Roof
  • Speil = Mirror
  • Seng = Bed
  • Stol = Chair
  • Bord = Table
  • Gulv = Floor
  • Kjøkken = Kitchen
  • Stue = Livingroom
  • Bad = Bathroom

Food

  • Mat = Food
  • Frukt = Fruit(s)
  • Eple = Apple
  • Appelsin = Orange
  • Kake = Cake
  • Brød = Bread
  • Nøtter = Nuts
  • Melk = Milk
  • Ost = Cheese
